title: My lol is lagging all people playing lol through my router
body:
Hi there,
This never used to be an issue. But now whenever I play lol with my girlfriend on the same connection, we get random lag spikes. Our ping is normally around 10-15, but the spikes make it go up to 300-1000+. I noticed that when lagging and I close my LoL and reconnect, the lag is gone for her. Sometimes it randomly comes back. Not sure what is going on because opening a browser and using facebook or downloading pictures almost comes up instantly with a bit of a delay, but the download speeds itself are fine. Please help me!! I've tried everything.

replies.body:
>I've tried everything.

To make sure we don't go over the same thing, could you provide a list of 'everything' you've tried?
